prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: As people are cutting costs, there's an increase in fraudulent and harmful jewelry on the market. Customers have been reporting problems and scams encountered both in the Czech Republic and abroad.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content:
Keywords:

cutting costs, fraudulent jewelry, harmful jewelry, market increase, customer reports, problems, scams, Czech Republic, abroad
